hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) Explosive Momentum Post-BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a 3-day period where BTC trades in a range (±1.5% from open) within a NEUTRAL or BULL regime, a breakout above that range will trigger outsized momentum in meme coins (DOGE, PEPE) vs. the crypto index over the next 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: BTC consolidation absorbs selling pressure and builds energy. A breakout signals 'all clear' for risk-on behavior, with retail/institutional traders rotating aggressively into high-beta, high-sentiment meme coins for amplified returns.
entry_conditions: BTC has traded within ±1.5% band for 3 consecutive days
BTC then breaks above the 3-day high
Simultaneously, aggregate meme coin volume (DOGE+PEPE) > 30-day average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Average return of DOGE & PEPE reaches +8% over entry (equal-weighted)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC price falls back into the 3-day range

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Meme coin basket underperforms broader crypto market (e.g., BTC, ETH, SOL average) after BTC range breakout.
